properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 6:35PM CST until January 11 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Wichita KS
properties.description:
...Winter Weather to impact the area this evening through
Saturday...

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of
up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an
inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Saline, McPherson and Harvey Counties.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED
